channel.title: Starter help!

item.title: Starter help!
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

I’m sure it’s something simple like the new starter isn’t being called, or the file isn’t being compiled. PM me your teamviewer details and I’ll take a look

Edit: noticed it’s not through command and upon login. You know it only works when starter = 0, are you setting that back each time?

Read full topic

item.title: Starter help!
item.dc:creator: @Dulagar Dulagar
item.description:
@Dulagar wrote:

Positive. Ive used the compiler already for a few different things, and it always ends up saying “finished!” and then “press any key to continue” and then i just turn the server back on and whatever ive changed is suppose to be changed; but not the starter.

Read full topic

item.title: Starter help!
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Dulagar:

I just took a look at that, it didnt help one bit. Thank you though. I even tried taking out one of the original items all together and putting in a new one in its place and that didnt even work. Its almost like the previous coder locked it somehow so no one could change it.

Are you sure that file is being compiled…?

item.title: Starter help!
item.dc:creator: @Dulagar Dulagar
item.description:
@Dulagar wrote:

Okay so i have a situation here. I wanted to fix up the starter a bit and make it so that way new players can receive a little more then what they are already. But when i try to change the starter, and i save, quit the server, compile, and then run the server again, it doesnt change at all. Any reason why? Everything that is highlighted in [color=green]green[/color] is what was originally in the starter, but i increased the amounts given. This works perfectly fine, the starter now gives 5m gp instead of 2m, like i wanted. But everything in [color=red]Red[/color] is what i added in that was never in the starter, and that doesnt appear after i save, compile, and restart. any ideas?

}
if(starter == 0){
splitChat = 1;
addItem(995, 5000000);
addItem(555, [color=green]1000[/color]);
addItem(560, [color=green]1000[/color]);
addItem(565,[color=green] 1000[/color]);
addItem(386,[color=green] 1000[/color]);
addItem(158, [color=green]200[/color]);
addItem(146, [color=green]200[/color]);
addItem(140, [color=green]200[/color]);
addItem(884, [color=red]1000[/color]);
addItem(841, [color=red]1[/color]);
addItem(861, [color=red]1[/color]);
addItem(5698, [color=red]1[/color]);
starter = 1;
sendQuest("", 16056);
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest(“Welcome “+playerName+”! We see that you are new!”, 16055);
sendQuest(“To get your first money go Ardougne and thieve stalls or Heros.”, 16057);
sendQuest(“If you want an update, Do ::Suggestion or ask Dulagar!”, 16058);
sendQuest(“Have FUN with the server, we are always looking for new staff, just DONT ASK for it.”, 16053);
sendQuest(“Contact Mods or Admins for help! =)”, 16054);
showInterface(16050);
flushOutStream();
}

Read full topic
